CustomField.description: Indicates whether this insurance policy includes or is eligible for a Health Savings Account (HSA).
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Check this box if the insurance plan is HSA-eligible or includes a Health Savings Account (HSA) option. HSA-eligible plans are typically high-deductible health plans (HDHPs) that allow the insured to contribute pre-tax funds to an HSA for qualifying medical expenses.
CustomField.label: HSA
